Description: As a stationery and advertising requisites salesman and merchandizer, your primary responsibility is to promote and sell a wide range of stationery products and office supplies to customers. Your duties may include:1. Engaging with customers to understand their stationery and office supply needs.2. Demonstrating product features and benefits to customers.3. Providing product recommendations based on customer requirements.4. Assisting customers in making purchasing decisions.5. Processing sales transactions accurately and efficiently.6. Maintaining knowledge of current product inventory and availability.7. Monitoring market trends and competitor activities.8. Building and maintaining relationships with customers to ensure repeat business.9. Resolving customer complaints or issues in a professional and timely manner.10. Collaborating with the sales team to achieve sales targets.Skills
Skills: To excel in this role, you should have excellent communication and interpersonal skills, a strong knowledge of stationery products and office supplies, and the ability to work independently while meeting sales goals.
